pr_title: Remove toggle flags button and 'L' hotkey for it

timeline.message:
Remap flag hotkey 'L' to ctrl+(1-3), remove show flags button

This update binds:
ctrl+1 = no flags
ctrl+2 = small flags
ctrl+3 = large flags

We also remove the 'L' hotkey listener that toggled through flag display
modes. With the hotkeys now labeled in the game view menu, and no more
'L' hotkey that was otherwise unlabelled, we can remove the not very
popular flag mode button that was in the unit scroller.
"Fix" test that fails now due to headed UI dependency by deleting it

timeline.author: RoiEXLab

replies.bodyText: AFAIK we did not remove any references to a display( method in this PR, please note if I'm wrong about that. Given that, the method should still be used if it was used before at all.
